About me:

I have always been fascinated by math and science. As an undergrad at the Colorado School of Mines, I decided to pursue a B.S. in Engineering. Afterwards, I went into the "working world" and realized that I had a passion for software engineering and the latest technology. This is when I decided to do a Master's in MCIT/CS at the University of Pennsylvania.
